Description: Rim and floor sherd of East Greek pottery sofa-rim plate; exterior and underside glazed, much worn; on top of rim, band to outside, band with added red and white lines to inside; between, maeander and square band; flat floor glazed as far as preserved.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.310)
